snippet: Internet Brands, which bought Wikitravel in 2005 without securing copyright to the site's travel reviews, is now in a legal battle with the Wikimedia Foundation over reproduction of its content.
abstract: Internet Brands, which bought Wikitravel in 2005 without securing copyright to the site's travel reviews, is now in a legal battle with the Wikimedia Foundation over reproduction of its content.

headline.main: Link by Link: Travel Site Built on Wiki Ethos Now Bedevils Owner
